Measure blood pressure.sentence: The nurse prepares the sphygmomanometer and stethoscope for measuring blood pressure.
Measure blood pressure.subject: The nurse

Measure blood pressure.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably with the arm at heart level.
Measure blood pressure.subject: The nurse

Measure blood pressure.sentence: The nurse wraps the cuff around the patient's upper arm and secures it snugly.
Measure blood pressure.subject: The nurse
Measure blood pressure.object: the cuff around the patient's upper arm

Measure blood pressure.sentence: The nurse inflates the cuff using the bulb until the pulse is no longer felt.
Measure blood pressure.subject: The nurse

Measure blood pressure.sentence: The nurse listens with the stethoscope while slowly deflating the cuff to obtain the systolic and diastolic pressures.
Measure blood pressure.subject: The nurse
